casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Tyrone Churell DAVIS No. 239P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019

Mark Montgomery, Attorney at Law, For Davis, Tyrone Churell

Tamara S. Zmuda, Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina

James R. Woodall, Jr., District Attorney, For State of North Carolina *840ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st of June 2019 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
